Description: Tests that an empty string returns 0.
Tests that a single number returns that number.
Tests that two numbers return their sum.
Tests that multiple numbers return their sum.
Tests that new lines can be used as delimiters along with commas.
Tests that a custom delimiter specified in the input works correctly.
Tests that a custom multi-character delimiter is handled correctly.
Tests that providing a negative number throws an exception.
Tests that providing multiple negative numbers throws an exception.
Tests that numbers greater than 1000 are ignored in the sum.
Tests that a mix of delimiters and numbers works as expected.
Tests that a string ending with a comma is not allowed (no output).
Tests that an empty string with spaces returns 0.
Tests that a single number with leading/trailing spaces returns that number.
Tests that a string that starts with a delimiter and has numbers after it returns the correct sum.
Tests that an invalid delimiter pattern (missing numbers) raises an exception.
Tests that negative numbers are correctly identified with custom delimiters.
Tests that all numbers above 1000 are ignored in the sum.
Tests the output when the input has only delimiters and no numbers.
